snippet: Benjamin Patton, grandson of General George S. Patton Jr. and son of Major General George S. Patton IV, has written a memoir about his family legacy. The book includes previously unpublished photographs and letters between his father and grandfather.
abstract: Benjamin Patton, grandson of General George S. Patton Jr. and son of Major General George S. Patton IV, has written a memoir about his family legacy. The book includes previously unpublished photographs and letters between his father and grandfather.

headline.main: Family War Stories, Both Lived and Told
